body.name: JAFATOY Retro Handheld Games Console for Kids/Adults, 168 Classic Games 8 Bit Games 3 inch Screen Video Games with AV Cable Play on TV (Black)

features: The console built in 168 classic nostalgia games, let you back to your childhood and enjoy family entertainment time.
Easy to connect the game console with TV ( AV connector cable is included), enjoy the larger screen gaming experience.
Handheld Game Console with 3 inches screen. 600mAh battery, each full charging enable you play up to 5~6 hours.
Compact and lightweight handheld game console, mini body, carry it with you. On the way to work, free time, the best choice for relaxing mood.
GREAT GIFT - This is a very suitable Birthday Christmas Holiday present for your kids, friends and anybody who love the old school games.
body.description: 8 Bit Handheld games built-in 168 retro FC classic games, let the kids to have happy hours with classic old school games. Specification: User: Children, Adults, Parents Screen:3.0" LCD Games: built-in 168 classic games Games Types : NES/ FC/ C3 retro games Languages: English & Chinese Speaker: Yes Working time: 5~6 hours Battery:600mAh Size: 13*8.5*2.6 CM AV output cable: 2.5mm jack Screen Resolution: 640 x 480 Pixels This game device can play when you are outside in the waiting room or boring bus trip or a long flying journey.As well,you can plug & play on your big TV screen with the included AV output cable when you are on a vacation at home. Tips: 1.Before connect to a TV,make sure that your TV and the unit are turned off. 2.Switch the channel on TV to the Audio/Video channel. Package include: 1 * Handheld Games Console 1 * USB charging cable 1 * AV cable 1 * User Manual

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 1,144 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought 3 of these !!! One for my daughter and 2 for my nephews !! They loved it!! Got them off the iPads. It has many games included which is a plus. They all loved Tetris though. Who doesn’t?! Great deal and great gift that doesn’t cost a fortune.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good game selection! But..
reviews.reviewText: This has a decent game selection, most of the NES classics. It has a few gameboy games too, but I bought this mainly for pokemon. It doesn’t have any pokemon games; but for less than 50$, it’s still a damned good deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Christmas gift for a guy who is hard to buy for. He was thrilled! I can't speak to any battery life or durability issues but it was definitely a hit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Buttons are not always responsive.
reviews.reviewText: Lots of games, very fun to play. I love showing my kids the games I grew up with. Only downside so far is the button response. It is hit or miss, which is an issue when trying to jump over a turtle....lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where was this thing 20+ years ago lol
reviews.reviewText: Totally worth the money (which is practically nothing for the amount of classic games already on it) battery life is decent and super cool feature that you can also place this little thing on the tv. Guarantee if you gave this to a kid now a days they’d look at you like you were crazy. Or maybe not who knows…. Some of y’all may have cool kids.. most prob HAHAHAHAH

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars junk don't buy
reviews.reviewText: just a piece of junk do not buy. battery was crap, and it wouldn't play the games what a waste

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This handheld game exceeded my expectations, which were not very high. It is still working after about a week. The batteries last quite a few hours once charged. There are many amusing games on it. It is easy to hold and fits in a pocket. Quote from the user, “It’s awesome. I like how long the batteries last. The buttons are marked clearly and work well. I like the shape. The games are cool. It has all the games I like and wanted to play. I really recommend it.” The only drawback is that a few games have text which is not available in English. That didn’t really matter though. Understanding the text was not necessary to play the games.I tried a different handheld game before I purchased this one. It did not even last an entire afternoon before it was completely useless. This is by far the better choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Has a few well known games available
reviews.reviewText: It worked well right out the box, gifted to my son who is a bit young for the more complicated gaming systems. Kept him occupied and I found myself in a bit of a nostalgic moment with a game or two while playing with it myself. If you miss playing the old game boys this little guy is suitable for casual fun.
